
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">老管家馨香洗衣液4斤装，学生用户页面可领6券，买2件3.71<br><a target="_blank" href="https://u.jd.com/8D4P4Xa">https://u.jd.com/8D4P4Xa</a> 
<p class="pl">叠<a href="https://u.jd.com/HzrAkMR" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">省省卡</a>和支付立减0.79买两</p><p class="pl">我是0.85</p><p class="pl">买了，页面没有券，<a href="https://wqs.jd.com/pingou_cps/smash_golden_egg/index.html?utm_jd2jx=1&amp;cu=true" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">砸蛋</a>有。</p><p class="pl">谢谢姐妹 我也是砸蛋有</p><p class="pl">到手5块钱8斤</p><p class="pl">怎么买的呀，怎么是9.9</p><p class="pl">价格不对</p><p class="pl">不对</p><p class="pl">我下了一单 两件1.59的，现在还能买 3件9.57。好用的吗？</p><p class="pl">买了</p>
